commit.message:
Use US-ASCII encoding for HTTP headers in FileServerHandler

Co-authored-by: Michael McMahon <michaelm@openjdk.org>

Reject HTTP Range requests with "+" prefix and enhance invalid range header tests

Co-authored-by: Daniel Fuchs <dfuchs@openjdk.org>

Fix parsing of HTTP Range header by specifying radix for Long.parseLong

Co-authored-by: Daniel Fuchs <dfuchs@openjdk.org>

Update documentation for HTTP range requests in SimpleFileServer

Co-authored-by: Daniel Fuchs <dfuchs@openjdk.org>
